programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform -odac ;;;RT audio out ;-iadc ;;;uncomment -iadc if RT audio input is needed too ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o alpass.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 ksmps = 100 nchnls = 2 0dbfs = 1
gamix init 0
instr 1
acps expon p4, p3, p5 asig vco 0.6, acps, 1 outs asig, asig
gamix = gamix + asig
endin
instr 99
arvt1 line 3.5*1.5, p3, 6 arvt2 line 3.5, p3, 4 ilpt = 0.1 aleft alpass gamix, arvt1, ilpt aright alpass gamix, arvt2, ilpt*2 outs aleft, aright
gamix = 0 ; clear mixer
endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore> f1 0 4096 10 1 i 1 0 3 20 2000
i 99 0 8 e
</CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
